name: Keye
headline: The Smartest Private Equity Investor
description:
Keye is an AI software that lets private equity firms do due diligence for acquisitions faster and more accurately. Our customers can evaluate 10x more deals and fund better companies which leads directly to better returns/more alpha.
--

Our system is the first of its kind to instantly generate complex, comprehensive data packs from raw data in any format, directly from the data room. This enables investors to gain an 80% understanding of a potential deal within moments, empowering them to say No to a deal earlier in the process and focus on high-potential opportunities. Traditionally, creating these detailed data packs—like cohort or retention analyses and customer roll-forwards—takes weeks, during which critical details may be overlooked, potentially costing funds millions in missed insights and poor decisions.
--

Keye combines cutting-edge AI with deep private equity expertise to deliver powerful, multi-layered insights that go far beyond the simple summarizers and search functions offered by other tools. Our platform dives deep into both quantitative and qualitative due diligence data, offering high-impact analytics crafted specifically for private equity workflows. This isn’t just automation—it’s a purpose-built solution that uncovers actionable insights, fueling smarter decisions and driving true alpha.
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:finance; industry:investing; industry:enterprise-software; industry:ai; location:new-york

founders.name: Rohan Parikh, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder & CEO at Keye, Rohan has over 6+ yrs in investment banking, spanning front-office roles across IB and Global Markets. Within 5 years, he was promoted to Director, where he drove a 7x increase in deal flow and revenue. Previously, he worked as a management consultant with Accenture before transitioning to Standard & Poor’s credit division in finance. Rohan holds an MBA from Wharton, complemented by a technical background with a Master's in Financial Engg. & B.Eng degree

founders.name: Conor Brown, Founder
founders.description: Conor is a Co-Founder and the Chief Operating Officer of Keye. Before co-founding Keye, Conor co-founded SecureFlow, a funds flow and deal insights platform for M&A, while earning an MBA from The Wharton School. He has also held key roles as an investor at Vista Equity Partners and an investment banker at Goldman Sachs. He attended Amherst College for his BA, where he also captained the hockey team.

founders.name: Lalit Lal, Cofounder, CTO
founders.description: Lalit is a Cofounder and CTO at Keye. By trade, Lalit is a seasoned software engineer with a over 7 years in industry experience leading and building SaaS products from the ground up. Working through 2 historical SaaS acquisitions as an early engineer and leading technical teams of various sizes, Lalit is comfortable across the stack (devops, frontend, backend, and ML). He comes from a background in Robotics (University of Waterloo) and Machine Learning (University of Toronto).

# Perform better diligence in less time with AI
Keye's purpose-built analysis system empowers deal teams to work faster and smarter with today's most powerful AI tech. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656dedb745265caf68ffa8ed/66ed8f9900c99d84e4d0b5f8_Backed%20by%20\(1128%20x%20191%20px\).svg)
[![Launch YC: Keye:old_key:: The Smartest Private Equity Analyst](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/MHP-keye-the-smartest-private-equity-analyst/upvote_embed.svg)](https://www.keye.co/<https:/www.ycombinator.com/launches/MHP-keye-the-smartest-private-equity-analyst>)
[Book Demo](https://www.keye.co/<https:/calendly.com/d/cngn-f73-hcd>)[Learn More](https://www.keye.co/<#ProductOverview>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656dedb745265caf68ffa8ed/656dedb745265caf68ffa9ce_Hero%20BG.svg)
## Learn about Keye in 2 minutes
## AI-Powered Analysis For Due Diligence
**Keye Diligence Platform** turns your data room and deal folders directly into critical insights, making your investment process faster and more effective. Today, Keye can:
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656dedb745265caf68ffa8ed/672c6486570aa9df5cefe229_Analyze.webp)
Analyze Filesets
Inference key information from large numbers of documents in any file format to get up to speed on a deal quickly.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656dedb745265caf68ffa8ed/672c64865ca6a456ee48c49b_Tag.webp)
Tag & Organize Data
Get an organized data pack in seconds with key risks and opportunities tagged & color coded.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656dedb745265caf68ffa8ed/672c64eee477269299713814_Risk.webp)
Extract Insights
Instantly generate key facts, easily create personalized data cuts & analyses you can compare to prior deals.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656dedb745265caf68ffa8ed/672c648740fe50ca445f9b34_Trace%20Audit.webp)
Audit Confidently
Perform data analysis with 100% accuracy and export to fully linked up Excel spreadsheets.
## Powered by proprietary data, AI engineering and LLM architecture
**Keye** does much more for investors than basic chatbots or summarization tools can. Our unique process is based on:
10,000+
Proprietary embeddings that re-structure content to draw new connections between your VDR files. Keye's AI backend uses vectorized data from the PE industry to generate specialized analysis.
30+
Years of experience in technology and finance industries among our founding team. We apply decades of learning to improve analysis quality and boost long-term returns for firms.
1,000+
Publicly available & synthetic deal documents that provide foundational training and testing, enabling our AI to dig deep for insights and anomalies in your data.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656dedb745265caf68ffa8ed/656e12c427f57b306479e292_Untitled%20design%20\(7\).svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656dedb745265caf68ffa8ed/656e0462974810ad4cf87f90_Untitled%20design%20\(6\).svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656dedb745265caf68ffa8ed/66f1b26bb8bcaa3c7141376a_Backed%20by%20\(1128%20x%20191%20px\).svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656dedb745265caf68ffa8ed/656e16b902ef3699df1f0a6c_White%20logo%20\(4\)%20\(2\).png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656dedb745265caf68ffa8ed/6731a01d552dc79e17682520_ERA.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656dedb745265caf68ffa8ed/656e0462974810ad4cf87f90_Untitled%20design%20\(6\).svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656dedb745265caf68ffa8ed/66f1b26bb8bcaa3c7141376a_Backed%20by%20\(1128%20x%20191%20px\).svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656dedb745265caf68ffa8ed/656e12c427f57b306479e292_Untitled%20design%20\(7\).svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656dedb745265caf68ffa8ed/656e0462974810ad4cf87f90_Untitled%20design%20\(6\).svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656dedb745265caf68ffa8ed/66f1b26bb8bcaa3c7141376a_Backed%20by%20\(1128%20x%20191%20px\).svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656dedb745265caf68ffa8ed/656e16b902ef3699df1f0a6c_White%20logo%20\(4\)%20\(2\).png)

OUR Company
## A Track Record of Success in Financial Intelligence
Keye’s data & information platform has served 25,000 users at corporations and investment firms for over 3 years. Now, we’re applying our technical expertise in AI and finance to bring a new, cutting-edge service to investors.
Our team previously worked at:
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656dedb745265caf68ffa8ed/656dfed0532de80aca175a2e_Keye%20SVG%20\(6\).svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656dedb745265caf68ffa8ed/656dfd980d935523301c30df_Keye%20SVG%20\(1\).svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656dedb745265caf68ffa8ed/656dfe2384937788bd440143_Keye%20SVG%20\(5\).svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656dedb745265caf68ffa8ed/656dffc30f6620a35c3af491_Keye%20SVG%20\(9\).svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656dedb745265caf68ffa8ed/656dff7d9d4a0553194a88b8_Keye%20SVG%20\(8\).svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656dedb745265caf68ffa8ed/656dedb745265caf68ffa9c6_Logo%2002.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656dedb745265caf68ffa8ed/656dfdc70390aeaa996033b2_Keye%20SVG%20\(2\).svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656dedb745265caf68ffa8ed/656dff743c7e0013b960c78d_Keye%20SVG%20\(7\).svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656dedb745265caf68ffa8ed/6731a1d2289fd723e1001eb8_Tesla%20Logo.webp)
OUR TECHNOLOGY
## AI-Native Data analysis tailored to PE investors
Our purpose-built analysis system uses today's most powerful AI technology to supercharge the private markets diligence process. We employ enterprise grade security and privacy throughout.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656dedb745265caf68ffa8ed/656dedb745265caf68ffa995_Bell.svg)
Insights & red flags distilled from large file uploads
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656dedb745265caf68ffa8ed/656dedb745265caf68ffa997_Chat.svg)
Reasoning & attribution provided for each analysis
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656dedb745265caf68ffa8ed/6571eb2b6a90738f824de815_Untitled%20design%20\(11\).png)
100% secure data processing with no training or retention
[**Learn More About the Keye Difference**](https://www.keye.co/</diligence-platform>)
**Chain of Thought Reasoning** Our proprietary reasoning system thinks and performs workflows like an investor would. Keye reviews your entire data set, prioritizes facts based on relevancy and allows for unlimited custom and templated analyses.
**Clear Methodology** With the ability to reveal underlying logic and export to Excel with formulas (no hardcoding), you always know exactly how Keye got to the answer.
**No Hallucination** With a completely deterministic analysis approach and data architecture, Keye gives you full confidence in automated data outputs.
## Ready to Transform?
Take the first step towards accelerating your due diligence with frontier AI. **Let's work together to elevate your deal process to new heights.**
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656dedb745265caf68ffa8ed/656dedb745265caf68ffa999_Time.svg)
Move fast and save time
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656dedb745265caf68ffa8ed/656dedb745265caf68ffa99e_Cloud.svg)
Handle thousands of files simultaneously
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656dedb745265caf68ffa8ed/656dedb745265caf68ffa99d_Code.svg)
Get instant insights
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656dedb745265caf68ffa8ed/656dedb745265caf68ffa998_Heart.svg)
Built by a passionate and experienced team
[Book a demo](https://www.keye.co/<https:/calendly.com/d/cngn-f73-hcd>)
## What users say
Keye is trusted by funds with billions of dollars under management. With our new Diligence Platform, the private equity community is more excited than ever to work with us to accelerate their investment process.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656dedb745265caf68ffa8ed/672b05c597cebc5d6d96029b_Avatar-Placeholder.webp)
Principal
LMM PE Firm
We’ve tried several AI tools, but most feel too generic for private equity needs. Keye stands out because it’s clearly designed with our workflow in mind. Instead of just summarizing data, it breaks down critical metrics—like customer retention and growth drivers—so we’re able to assess true business health quickly.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656dedb745265caf68ffa8ed/6730439445b3c8e6b01c9eec_quotation-right-mark-svgrepo-com.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656dedb745265caf68ffa8ed/672b05c597cebc5d6d96029b_Avatar-Placeholder.webp)
MD
Healthcare PE fund
Keye's real value add is really to do all the analysis that we would have just ignored or forgotten, because of the sheer volume of trades that we due-diligence and associates who just don't have more time at hand. This is where it really contributes to alpha, because we can go even more deeper into analysis with a lot less time.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656dedb745265caf68ffa8ed/6730439445b3c8e6b01c9eec_quotation-right-mark-svgrepo-com.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656dedb745265caf68ffa8ed/672b05c597cebc5d6d96029b_Avatar-Placeholder.webp)
PE Consultant
Advisory firm
The Keye team has a deep understanding of PE and goes above and beyond for clients. It’s clear they leveraged deep expertise to build the platform. Within days of kicking off, the founders worked with us to tailor the analytics and add some industry-specific analysis we had mentioned, with not much effort from our end.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656dedb745265caf68ffa8ed/6730439445b3c8e6b01c9eec_quotation-right-mark-svgrepo-com.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656dedb745265caf68ffa8ed/6575ddbf883c9d3bd292d43b_Untitled%20design%20\(16\).svg)
More soon...

Keye is trusted by thousands of professionals. With our new AI service, the private equity community is more excited than ever to work with us to accelerate due diligence.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656dedb745265caf68ffa8ed/65735028252b2dba3adb34e7_Untitled%20design%20\(14\).png)
Haemi Kim
director
Keye has some really helpful features, especially being able getting additional financial data when I need it. I can double-check my numbers with services that normally would have been out of reach. Subscribing was a no-brainer.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656dedb745265caf68ffa8ed/65733de03c981ac46a390343_Untitled%20design%20\(12\).svg)
Hari Sripathi
Investment professional
I am a boutique consultant and use Keye to access a much broader variety of resources than would’ve been affordable on their own. Specifically, I use Keye for opportunity evaluation and market research that wouldn't be possible for me to handle on my own.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656dedb745265caf68ffa8ed/6575dd806c651f281aeb1f6a_Untitled%20design%20\(15\).svg)

VICE PRESIDENT
AI is going to be an essential component of financial workflows. We're excited to be working with Keye and looking forward to growing our partnership.

**Learn More About the Keye Difference**⟨3⟩
**Chain of Thought Reasoning** Our proprietary reasoning system thinks and performs workflows like an investor would. Keye reviews your entire data set, prioritizes facts based on relevancy and allows for unlimited custom and templated analyses.
**Clear Methodology** With the ability to reveal underlying logic and export to Excel with formulas (no hardcoding), you always know exactly how Keye got to the answer.
**No Hallucination** With a completely deterministic analysis approach and data architecture, Keye gives you full confidence in automated data outputs.
## Ready to Transform?
Take the first step towards accelerating your due diligence with frontier AI. **Let's work together to elevate your deal process to new heights.**
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656dedb745265caf68ffa8ed/656dedb745265caf68ffa999_Time.svg)

Get instant insights
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656dedb745265caf68ffa8ed/656dedb745265caf68ffa998_Heart.svg)
Built by a passionate and experienced team

generated_description:
### Keye: Revolutionizing Due Diligence for Private Equity

**Mission**: Keye aims to be "The Smartest Private Equity Investor" by transforming how private equity firms conduct due diligence. 

**Founded**: This innovative company was established in 2024 and is part of Y Combinator Batch F24. Based in New York, Keye currently has a lean team of just three employees, guided by Group Partner Garry Tan.

**What They Do**: Keye started as an AI software solution for private equity firms, enabling them to evaluate acquisitions with unprecedented speed and accuracy. Their platform empowers users to assess ten times more deals, leading to better investment decisions and enhanced returns—essentially more alpha.

**Unique Offering**: Keye is pioneering a due diligence platform that can instantly generate complex data packs from any format of raw data supplied in a data room. Investors can gain an 80% comprehension of a potential deal within moments, allowing them to reject subpar opportunities quickly and focus on the most promising ones. The traditional process for producing these intricate reports can take weeks, causing critical details to slip through the cracks, often leading to significant financial repercussions.

**How It Works**: Keye combines advanced AI technology with extensive private equity expertise to deliver insights that surpass basic summarization tools. Their platform dives into both quantitative and qualitative analyses, generating actionable insights that enhance decision-making processes. This isn’t just automation; it’s a tailored solution specifically designed to uncover vital insights intrinsic to private equity workflows.

**Key Features**:
- **Quick Analysis**: Parse through large files instantly to extract key information.
- **Data Organization**: Generate organized data packs in seconds, highlighting crucial risks and opportunities.
- **Insight Generation**: Create customized analyses and track historical performance comparisons seamlessly.
- **Confident Auditing**: Conduct data evaluations with pinpoint accuracy and easily export findings.

**Technical Edge**: Keye boasts a sophisticated AI backend that leverages over 10,000 proprietary embeddings tailored to reshape content from private equity documents, alongside 30 years of cumulative experience in finance and technology among its founders. With access to over 1,000 deal documents, the platform is trained to identify insightful anomalies and patterns in data.

**User Base**: Keye has already garnered attention from around 25,000 users at investment firms and corporations keen on enhancing their due diligence processes using the platform’s innovative capabilities.

### Why It Matters

Private equity is a highly competitive space where the difference between winning and losing can hinge on the smallest insights. By providing tools that refine and expedite due diligence, Keye is positioning itself as a vital ally for investment professionals. The ability to efficiently analyze massive datasets not only saves time but also enhances the likelihood of successful investments. In a world fueled by data, having the right tools to leverage that data could well be the key to navigating the complexities of private equity.

For more information, check out their website at [Keye](https://www.keye.co).
